name: Of Sound Mind
description:
Can't wait to see your friend Kasey.

All played with a mouse, clicking buttons. My various approaches to a skip button failed, so if you just have a minute you might want to "Skip to the destination" from the start.

This was a solo project, all made by myself in 72 hours. I can't say I've never felt worse at Unity, because this piled on a lot of functionality with autoplay sections and sound with volume controls. But it's rough for sure.
